transcript.text: Friends welcome to the last episode of "The Last Guardian "
Remember at the end of the previous episode
Trico had a horrible fall
After his fight with the.. euh the other Trico
Trico just threw up the mirror
which could allow us to get some food
to help heal him
because he is not doing well so far
I think there something to do... Look here it is this famous
chain f***
So we need to point this at the top
will Trico be able to use his power ?
Nice! You did it!
Keep going ! I'll be right here
I hope there is going to be at least
four barrels to make him a feast!
Yeah there should be something in the debris
Oh yes! I got it!
We've never been so happy to find those !
Hop là, perfect. Right in his mouth !
It's gonna comfort you!
A second one...
Hop là the second one. Perfect big boy !
So will you stand up now ?
Do I have to bring some more ? Is it going to be enough ?
He doesn't seem to want to move... I think he needs more of them
Anyway there's not a thousand ways. There's over here too.
We can... we can climb. I'm gonna look for it over there
But he got hurt so bad...so
He'll need, like three or four barrels to
get entirely healed
Right... I'm.... hey !
Damn
I could have died stupidly
Oh I just saw other barrels over there...
Oh shoot, I fainted
Time has been passing by...
Both of us are so hurt, sh*t
head booboo...
Trico here I come...And we can even hear it's heart beat
It's awful. We see he's doing really bad
Wait I saw barrels in there
See, there is one over there
Hop là! One more and I'll bring the last one
It's just behind you
All right, four barrels...
Do I have to bring some more or is it going to be enough ?
... It seems to be the end
Beginning of the night,
the end of the day
"Exhausted,
I  was falling asleep..."
Okay new day,
maybe the last one
sad...uh
*laugh*
It's funny because usually it's your cat
that sleeps next to you !
yes
He's standing up !
"Do you feel better?"
Alright ?
You gave it all !
"Can you stand up ? Amazing !"
"Do you think we can climb back up?"
Don't worry I get it. We are going to climb all of this up
He does agree !
It makes me so happy !
Look at those big horns he has now! Oh you're an adult now Trico
You're not the baby of the beginning anymore !
You don't waste time. Man, he's going right away
Yes ! Yes !
Ugh, this a**hole
Oh ok, I think I have to get out the mirror. Go, zap him Trico!
Does it work on an enemy?
Yeah!! It's really effective!
We'll climb up all of this, buddy
Let's reach again the...
Weird building that we found.
We'll go up...
Really really well done. Sh*t it's so high!
We have a long trail to climb, plus if there are guards we have to demolish them
ohhh, I suspected that!
You aim well!
Ok, let's climb back up
Truly all of the last level! It's amazing
Ok, we have to explode this door, I guess?
Ok, we got it !
Like this you can jump over there. I think we have to go there.
Ok! You don't waste time do you? You are going directly to the left.
Well, go ahead, I'll follow you. I am following you.
Oh, sh*t. We're back to this stupid place! We already passed this
Go! Go ahead buddy you can do it! Let's go!
Ugh, he dares not moving. That's crazy!
Come on! Yes!
Are you going to resist the evil waves?
It's going to be ok
Are you ok, Trico?
Ok, buddy. Courage! It's ok, it's ok! Do you think we can break it, Trico?
Ok, go ahead and explode it
Well done big guy! You resisted it!
Sh*t! Hey, you got over your fear of mirrors. Now you exploded the evil waves thing!
Let's go, guy !
We'll go into the dark. I suggest we try exploding the windows from far away
Yes!! Oh, that's nice
Yeaaah like Star Wars, that's awesome
Come on, let's try to fly out Trico!
I'll trust you on the jump, I'm not sure where we should go
Jump, buddy, yes it's nice what you're doing but you have to jump
Let's keep going, you have the abilities...
but you don't use them :)
We've heard that sentence a lot :)
Find the angle, find what you want, calculate... and let's go
yes!
Perfect, ok you have to do this pillar by pillar, yes that's it
Ok, and we'll go across this whole thing with the help of the pillars
Well done big guy!
another one...
Yeah, very well done
We made it inside, perfect!
So I think we wouldn't have exploded 600 mirrors here if this wasn't the right trail
so Trico
You should come here
and sit on this thing
It's like a ladder in the end, it's a ladder for people like Trico
for 40 meter (131 feet) long monsters
Very, very well he understands all by himself. I love him :)
Oh and now you see I have to do this on my own. So stay here, Trico
I know that you're sad like each time that I have to leave you all alone
but we'll be back together soon, like each time I do something alone
Look at where this trail takes us, a small wooden footbridge along the building
oh sh*t
oh sh*****t
I almost screw up again !
Normally I could reach that, we agree it's not too high
Yeah, it's just me that was sh*t, ok
Nothing is too high
for this little boy anyway. But that's true !
Now Trico, you will have to join us here, I don't know how I can get him to come here
Ahh, I'll open this metal gate for you
Very well. Ok, come on
we've got to get across this bridge with your skill in jumping really far
Yeah!
Oh no oh no oh noooo
Oh it's all good
Do you need help? Nah, it's good you got it
Well played my Trico!
Did you see ? You've gotten really big now, you use your wings and everything
And you're not falling when the bridge crumbles
Knowing that everything crumbles in this sh*tty universe
We can access...
This little bridge that will let us climb back up using the things...
Like this thing, with the torches, alright. Come on. Let's go !
Oooh I've got a jump to make, I'm counting on you Trico
Oh no that's ok! You can...
I was going to jump and grab the rope. Guy such a stupid death!
Well done Trico
Oh there are some guards, let's exterminate them buddy
One down
They are not coming they are....
And two down, very well!
o...k
sh*t!
Ohhh poor thing
you face-planted...
Are you ok? We are in the middle of climbing up furiously
I am sure in the end he is going to fly away and grab the main tower
I'm sure
I don't know where he hit you (with the spear), I'll pull it out soon I promise
Ok we're fine, we have to redo it
A system with momentum
I guess. But this is one of the railings where I can pass through the bars
Don't look at me like that, big guy! I am going to do what I need to, look there are little steps
This will surely lower the opposite bridge for you
Ok, we're up
Is there a system for... oh yeah here it is
This must be to activate
the big bridge across from me
Ah no ! It's the one of this tower but well... haha he was putting his paws on the wall
Alright let's go, we are looking at you jumping
Let's go!
People ask me if he can fly but I'm not sure he could
I'll just take these little steps here anyway
They're clearly not here for nothing
Ok, and there's a lever
What's going on ?
It's stupid, we just completed the bridge that leads to where we just came from
Oh, ok!
It's to get enough momentum so we can jump/fly to the main tower
Ohh... Get momentum!
There are guards!
wow
woooow he made him fall!
Ok we demolished them all, now Trico we'll try to go inside the tower buddy
Maybe by going around here
Maybe the kind of object we found, the last time we were on this building
the kind of.. I don't know, it looks like the kind of thing you need to put an object in it
Maybe we just need to send the reflection of the miror on it
We put Trico's power in it. We'll see
Anyway it was on the back
Come on, come on Trico
Look. That !
I'm sure. Here is how we are going to enter.
We need to put the mirror ! Quite simply !
Here it is !
That's it ! We made it, we are going inside. We'll have answers to our questions.
That's amazing buddy !
So what's going on in here ?
Are you coming big boy ?
What are they doing here ?
That's beautiful !
Again something where to put the mirror in it.
What's that ?
It's doing nothing special.
Oh ! It's a lift !
It's insane !
Sh*t
The ceiling was preventing us to keep on going.

Blast ! Can't I take the tail ?
(camera shut down during 2 min)
Ok, I have to take yours
Here we go !
I'm certain we need to go here.
Oh! Look! Perfect!
It's going to be ok Trico !
We've already been in this position 600 000 times you and I.
And adding to that your tail is dangling so I will be able
to use it to attack the... guards
that will show themselves
Look there are helmets here.
That's not complicated
You take the helmets, you put them into the armor
and you go back to Trico so he can destroy them with his tail
Look! Hop!
Come on here.
Okay, I just need to jump.
Armors don't know how to jump
And then I take the mirror and I eliminate you pal !
He is a clever dick ! Go on !
That's good !
He took a shot at point-blank range
All of you come so that we won't be speaking about that anymore !
OK, I'll need to put the helmet on both of them
Here it is! Much better!
R.I.P my friend !
Here it is, the last one implode quite efficiently !
We are going to see what's left to do with mirrors slots
Do they serve the same purpose ?
Ah ! Actually we need to activate them ! Ok !
We'll keep going until having them all activated
I'm hearing guard's steps. It's making me stressed.
I think this one is the last one !
Yeah ! It's opening.
We're coming Trico!
Ouah! It's going to lead on the top of it!
Okay, Trico I'm coming. Don't go there without me.
Ok, we are good! Towards the truth!
Let's go ! It's going to be insane !
We're going to go up very high !
Let's go my Trico !
We are going to know the origin of our existence
Of your existence especially
Holy sh*t !
Wait, we are coming into a new room so I'm being careful.
There's a lot of guards' doors
It's not good at all !
And here it is ! Here it is ! Here it is !
It was obvious ! No !
Oh what we did to the one which ended up in the door!
So du*b!
You! You are going to stup with your fuc***g mirror, son of a b**ch
Here! In the hole. No more mirror!
Go Trico! Have fun!
Destroy them!
I'm forced to run big guy because they're trying hard to catch me.
Hopefully I'm strong at British Bulldog, I'm placing dummy moves but...
Oh! He destroys them all...
...even me, but that's okay!
Let's go! There are some of them remaining
There's the other one with its mirror and who didn't suceed yet in getting it back !

Let's go pull those stakes out of you and we move on big guy!

Well.Okay

Oh no...

Okay, I already spotted a shinny thing over here

because Trico has never been here

we are going to do it branch to branch
you can stand on this. Right?

nice! my boy
nice, perfect
you keep climbing

yeah it's for me
don't worry, don't worry, i'm coming
i'm going to see what's in there

oh he doesn't like when i do that

and let's go

wohoo!
